name: RetroKnight
description:
Retro Knight is a side scrolling game where you are a knight and must defeat monsters to get to the exit.

Right know this is just a demo of the game that I will use to get feedback from your comments. Right know there's only the starting level, but more levels and features will be added in the future taking in account if people like it.

Future plans: More levels, puzzles, items and enemies.
